characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the end of your Movement phase, a Hellwright can repair a single DAEMON ENGINE/QUESTOR TRAITOROUS or DARK MECHANICUS VEHICLE (other than models that can Fly) within 1". That model regains D3 lost wounds. A Hellwright can instead curse a single enemy VEHICLE within 18". Roll a D6; on a roll of 2+ that VEHICLE suffers a mortal wound. A VEHICLE cannot be repaired or cursed by more than one Hellwright in the same turn.
